title: Oshi Ga Office No Douryou Ni!? - Fansa Wa Oku Iki! 0.01Mm De Nando Mo Tsukarete Mitchaku Zetchou

status: My Idol Is Now My Colleague!? -Taking Things All The Way In The Name Of Fan Service! - ; Oshi ga Office no Douryou ni!? ; Oshi ga Office no Douryou ni!? - Fansa wa Oku Iki! 0.01mm de Nando mo Tsukarete Mitchaku Zetchou ; 推しがオフィスの同僚に!? ; 推しがオフィスの同僚に!?～ファンサは奥イキ！ 0.01mmで何度も突かれて密着絶頂～
description:
Description :
        Kiyoha Yumise is a huge fan of the boy band Polaris, specifically of the member Aoto. Kiyoha frequently wonders what Aoto is up to since leaving the band years ago, and is shocked when her company's new hire turns out to be him!! Kiyoha is left in charge of training Aoto, but is flabbergasted by the cold shoulder he seems to give only her. Despite being convinced that Aoto hates her, he somehow winds up at her house to spend the night. Aoto is determined to make her feel good as thanks for her hospitality, and one thing leads to another...!
